section.title: Maven pushTrans superseded by pushType
section.para: The maven -Dzanata.pushTrans option is now deprecated and is replaced by -Dzanata.pushType, which can take the following values:

listitem.para: Push source documents only (This is the default value when not specified)
Push both source documents and translations

section.para: If the now deprectated pushTrans option is used, it is interpreted as -Dzanata.pushType=both.
